Bonferroni, Holm, and List et al. adjusted p-values are calculated using the Stata code from List et al. (2018). The sharpened q-values are calcualted using the Stata code from Anderson (2008). Note that the code in List et al. (2018) only makes adjustments for SMD estimates of the treatment effect. Additionally, the calculations do not accommodate the presence of covariates or other controls.
